chapter.title: Building a New Example
chapter.para: To create and add a new example to the TOUCH_EXAMPLES you have to do the following steps:

section.title: Create the cluster
section.para: At first, a cluster has to be created.

section.title: Create 3 new classes
section.para: Just create the 3 new classes named EXAMPLENAME, EXAMPLENAME_3D_APPLICATION and EXAMPLENAME_3D_SCENE.
The class EXAMPLENAME contains the code which is executed in this particular example.
EXAMPLENAME_3D_APPLICATION is the root class of the whole example.
The third class EXAMPLENAME_3D_SCENE sets the first scene and invokes the examplecode from EXAMPLENAME.
One code example of all three classes can be seen here: Classes Needed for a New Example.
